package:
openrtm_aist_python 1.1.1
Python binding of OpenRTM-AIST (see openrtm_aist for further information).
Its development is happening at openrtm.org/pub/OpenRTM-aist. The repository listed below is that of its ROS wrapper.
Kei Okada Isao Isaac Saito Shinji Kurihara
EPL http://ros.org/wiki/openrtm_aist_python -->
catkin
unzip
python-omniorb python-omniorb
